Running out of the batter's box, Teixeira injured his left calf. This was in the fourth inning, more than three hours before the Toronto Blue Jays took a ninth-inning lead, gave it back, then
results.title: BLUE JAYS 8, YANKEES 7; Yanks Lose, but Focus Is Teixeira's Calf Injury

results.body: SOUTH WILLIAMSPORT, Pa. (AP) -- Arms outstretched in the air with a smile from ear to ear, Noriatsu Osaka could not contain his glee. Neither could his teammates from Tokyo after Osaka's third home run of the game put an exclamation point on Japan's 12-2 victory over Tennessee in five innings in the Little League World Series title game Sunday.
results.title: JAPAN 12, TENNESSEE 2; Japan Overwhelms Tennessee in Final

results.body: CHICAGO -- The first-place White Sox , in the thick of a pennant race, hosted the Seattle Mariners at U.S. Cellular Field on Saturday on a gorgeous 86-degree evening. A crowd announced at 27,562 was on hand as the home team won, 5-4. Earlier in the day, eight miles north at Wrigley Field, a crowd announced as 35,296 watched the fifth-place Cubs
results.title: Compared With Cubs, White Sox Can't Win for Winning

results.body: Here was their chance to interrogate a few of the men responsible for the Mets ' latest collapse. results.title: METS 2, ASTROS 1; While Front Office Addresses the Future, the Mets Enjoy an All-Too-Rare Moment

results.body: Matt Holliday is hoping to play a key role in another playoff run for the St. Louis Cardinals . He had plenty of help Sunday. Holliday had four hits and four runs batted in, Adam Wainwright had his fifth straight winning start and the Cardinals beat the Reds , 8-2, in Cincinnati. results.body: CLEVELAND -- Although Hiroki Kuroda lost the game, he provided exactly the kind of performance that persuaded ed the Yankees to sign him last winter. results.body: Scott Radinsky pitched for four major league teams from 1990 to 2001. A left-handed reliever who appeared in 557 games, Radinsky compiled a 42-25 record, a 3.44 earned run average and 52 saves. In 2004, he began working his way up the coaching ranks for the Cleveland Indians , serving as a pitching coach for four of their minor league teams. In
results.title: Out of a Job, but Not Missing a Beat

results.body: The first leg of the Oakland Athletics ' seven-game trip went just fine. Brandon McCarthy (7-5) pitched seven solid innings Saturday as Oakland beat the Tampa Bay Rays, 4-2. Chris Carter and Seth Smith homered for the Athletics, who took two of three from Tampa Bay and moved to a half-game behind the Rays for the lead in the American League
results.title: ROUNDUP; Athletics' Rebound Pressures The Rays

results.body: For the last week, Mark LeBrun, a die-hard Red Sox fan, has been referring to the Boston baseball club as ''the team who shall not be named.''
